app_metadata.description: is a free, open-source genealogy system for building your family tree – together. Use it standalone or as a companion to Gramps Desktop, with full control over your data and privacy as the top priority.
app_metadata.name: gramps-web

run_as_context.description: Gramps Web runs as root user.
Redis runs as any non-root user.

app_metadata.title: Gramps Web

attrs.label: Redis Password
attrs.description: The redis password for Gramps Web.

attrs.label: Disable Anonymous Telemetry
attrs.description:
Disable anonymous telemetry for Gramps Web.</br>
This will prevent Gramps Web from sending anonymous statistics data to the Gramps project.

attrs.label: Secret App Key
attrs.description:
The secret app key for Gramps Web.</br>
Must be at least 32 characters long.</br>

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access
Expose port for inter-container communication
None

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

1.1.14.readme:
Gramps Web

Gramps Web is a free, open-source genealogy system for building your family tree – together. Use it standalone or as a companion to Gramps Desktop, with full control over your data and privacy as the top priority.

chart_metadata.description: is a free, open-source genealogy system for building your family tree – together. Use it standalone or as a companion to Gramps Desktop, with full control over your data and privacy as the top priority.
chart_metadata.name: gramps-web

run_as_context.description: Gramps Web runs as root user.
Redis runs as any non-root user.
